name.jp: 鍛冶屋の心得・精錬編

description.en: This scroll prevents the loss of equipment in the event of upgrade or elemental attribute upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.ar: This scroll prevents the loss of equipment in the event of upgrade or elemental attribute upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.br: Esse pergaminho evita que equipamentos sejam destruídos em caso de falha no fortalecimento padrão ou elementar. Para usar, coloque o pergaminho na caixa apropriada no menu de Fortalecimento antes de iniciar a tentativa de aprimoramento. O pergaminho é consumido no processo.
description.cns: 精炼或属性精炼装备(武器)前先使用卷轴，精练失败物品不会消失，无法增加精练(属性精练)的成功率。一张卷轴适用一次精炼，最高防护到+10。
description.de: Schützt eine Waffe, Rüstung oder ein Schild vor dem Zerbrechen beim normalen Upgrade.
description.fi: This scroll prevents the loss of equipment in the event of upgrade or elemental attribute upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fil: This scroll prevents the loss of equipment in the event of upgrade or elemental attribute upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fr: Parchemin protégeant une arme ou une pièce d'armure de la destruction lors de son enchantement (efficace à 100%, mais chaque parchemin n'est actif que pour une seule tentative d'enchantement).
description.id: Gulungan ini mencegah hilangnya peralatan jika terjadi peningkatan atau kegagalan peningkatan atribut elemen. Untuk menggunakan, tempatkan gulir di kotak yang sesuai pada Menu Upgrade sebelum mencoba upgrade. Gulungan dikonsumsi dalam proses.
description.it: This scroll prevents the loss of equipment in the event of upgrade or elemental attribute upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.jp: 通常精錬、属性精錬、スプレット精錬に失敗してもアイテムの消失を1回だけ防止してくれる巻物。成功・失敗に関わらず消費します。(通称:SProtect)
description.kr: 일반, 유니크 아이템의 강화, 속성 제련 시 아이템 소실 방지
description.nl: This scroll prevents the loss of equipment in the event of upgrade or elemental attribute upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.pl: This scroll prevents the loss of equipment in the event of upgrade or elemental attribute upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.ru: Одноразовый. Предотвращает поломку снаряжения при неудачной попытке усилить его камнем или арканом. Используйте свиток перед тем, как усиливать предмет.
description.sp: Este pergamino evita la pérdida de equipo en caso de fracaso en la mejora o mejora de atributos elementales. Para usarlo, coloca el pergamino en la casilla correspondiente del Menú de Mejora antes de intentar la mejora. El pergamino se consume en el proceso.
description.sw: This scroll prevents the loss of equipment in the event of upgrade or elemental attribute upgrade failure. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.th: คัมภีร์นี้ป้องกันการสูญเสียอุปกรณ์ในกรณีที่การอัพเกรดหรือการอัพเกรดธาตุล้มเหลว ในการใช้งาน ให้วางคัมภีร์ไปที่กล่องที่เหมาะสมบนเมนูอัพเกรดก่อนที่จะพยายามอัพเกรด
description.tw: 精鍊前需先使用卷軸，精鍊或附加屬性失敗時物品不會消失，無法增加精鍊成功機率，一張卷軸適用一次精鍊(不論成功或失敗)。
description.vi: Cuộn này ngăn chặn việc mất trang bị trong trường hợp nâng cấp hoặc nâng cấp thuộc tính nguyên tố không thành công. Để sử dụng, hãy đặt cuộn vào ô thích hợp trên Menu Nâng cấp trước khi thử nâng cấp. Cuộn giấy được sử dụng trong quá trình này.
